resources.string: The options menu is open. You can now use regular TalkBack gestures to navigate. Swipe right to see more options.
To finish the tutorial, swipe up with 3 fingers, and find the finish tutorial option
With the braille keyboard, you can tap your screen to enter 6-dot braille.\n\nYou’re using Unified English Braille. To switch your input language, go to TalkBack settings.
Your %1$s should be on dot 1. Now, tap dot 1 to type the letter “A”.
